title: Psycho Diver: Mashou Bosatsu (Psycho Diver: Soul Siren)
synopsis: Yuki Kano has it all: fame, wealth, the world at her feet. There's also something very wrong with her... from time to time, she's totally unable to sing (which, for a pop star, is not good). Enter Bosujima, a "psycho diver" with the capability to enter people's heads and straighten out what's wrong with them. Well, most of the time, anyway.
staff: [['Kanbe, Mamoru', ['Director', ' Storyboard']], ['Iwao, Junko', ['Theme Song Performance']], ['GARDEN', ['Theme Song Arrangement', ' Theme Song Composition']], ['Yamakawa, Yoshiki', ['Key Animation']]]
